summary: Join Barbie in an all-new world of Butterfly Fairies! When the Queen falls ill, it's up to brave Mariposa and her friends to journey beyond the safe borders of the city to find a cure.
cast: Chiara Zanni|Tabitha St. Germain|Kathleen Barr|Erin Mathews|Nicole Oliver|Alessandro Juliani|Cathy Weseluck|Alistair Abell|Kelly Sheridan|Lee Tockar|Terry Klassen|Jane Barr|David Kaye
title: Barbie Mariposa y sus amigas las hadas
